history.proof: intros x H. sfirstorder use: NormedModule.ax5 unfold: NormedModule.sort, AbelianGroup.sort, norm, NormedModuleAux.sort, NormedModuleAux.class, NormedModule.base, NormedModuleAux.AbelianGroup, NormedModule.AbelianGroup.

exceptions.tactic: pose proof (NormedModule.ax5 K V H) as H'.
exceptions.exn: In environment K : AbsRing V : NormedModule K x : V H : norm x = 0 The term "H" has type "norm x = 0" while it is expected to have type "NormedModule.mixin_of K V".

original: intros x H. pose proof (NormedModule.ax5 K V H) as H'. apply H'.
